snippet: Guards did not make the required checks on Ariel Castro, the Cleveland man convicted of holding three women captive for a decade, on the day he hanged himself in his cell, a state report said.
abstract: Ohio report says prison guards falsified records and failed to properly complete their rounds on day Ariel Castro, man convicted of holding three women captive in his Cleveland home for a decade, hanged himself in his cell in September.
lead_paragraph: Guards did not make the required checks on Ariel Castro, the Cleveland man convicted of holding three women captive for a decade, on the day he hanged himself in his cell, a state report said.

headline.main: Prison Oversight Faulted in Ariel Castro’s Death
headline.print_headline: Prison Oversight Faulted In Ohio Captor’s Death
